name: Cloudy (Lilyel)
description:
Hello 😳

Here is a little game I made. You have to touch/click the screen to make the drop bounce and hit the clouds. Some clouds are good, some not so much ! 

The objective is to score as much points as possible before losing all your health points. 

You can unlock new clouds by reaching higher score.

I hope you will have fun playing it 😳

So sorry, it doesn't work on iPhone's browsers 😭

Credits : 

Music - Tim Beek

Sounds - Audios_19

Spanish translations - Orënne

The rest - me 😳

Big big thanks to :

Party Heralds for their feedbacks

Benzine for his help and feedbacks

Orënne for her immense help, support and feedbacks

❤️

⚠️ There can be some flashes in the game from time to time, I don't know if it is enough to be harmful to photosensitive people, so please, be careful ❤️
